name: easemob-simulator
description: 环信通信模拟器开发环境

scripts.win32: electron-packager ./app simulator --platform win32 --arch ia32 --out dist/ --overwrite --download.mirror https://npm.taobao.org/mirrors/electron/ --asar
scripts.win64: electron-packager ./app simulator --platform win32 --arch x64 --out dist/ --overwrite --download.mirror https://npm.taobao.org/mirrors/electron/ --asar
scripts.mac: electron-packager ./app simulator --platform darwin --arch x64 --out dist/ --overwrite --download.mirror https://npm.taobao.org/mirrors/electron/ --asar
